title: Cashier & Accountant
description:
- Ensure e-commerce customers pay all orders via Cash on Delivery, third-parties, bank transfers
- Manage cash on daily basis for purchasing and sourcing team
- Ensure payment of invoices
- Review employee expenses
- Create bank transfer request
- Do pay runs
- Work with accounting, audit and law firms to design and implement counting policies and procedures, including those related to tax
requirements:
- This position, we only need less than 2 years experiences
- Experience with cashier
- Cash handling ability (counting, tracking)
- Excel
- Comfortable and accurate working with numbers
- Knowledge of basic accounting & finance
- Willingness to learn management accounting and tax
